FastPhrase Team (left to right): Jennings Fairchild, Justin Tan, Matt Dyl, Bob Timm, Wesley Vance

FastPhrase was designed and created at Texas A&M University for a senior design project in Computer Science. Under the guidance of Dr. Robin Murphy, FastPhrase is an application designed to aid emergency workers in disaster situations where translations are needed without a reliable internet connection. For more on Dr. Murphy and her research in the field of robotics and emergency response, please visit http://faculty.cs.tamu.edu/murphy/
